about_the_game:
RaLo is a minimal yet mind-bending drumming game where you must copy a reference pattern... except when you shouldn't.

Your goal is to repeat the rhythm played on the top set of drums onto the bottom set of drums. But, for some of the drums, you'll have to do exactly the opposite. The whole game runs on only those two rules, but the levels take them to their extreme consequences. Playing RaLo is a test of quick thinking, counting, and precision.



  • Learn a very small set of rules.
  • Get into a flow with an elegant electronic soundtrack.
  • Train your mental and rhythmic agility.
  • Challenge yourself with some increasingly tough modifiers.
  • Become a one-button drumming champion.
